newton_laws.first_law: An object will remain at rest or in uniform motion unless acted upon by an external force.
newton_laws.second_law: Force equals mass times acceleration (F = ma).
newton_laws.third_law: For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction.

einstein_theories.special_relativity: The laws of physics are the same for all non-accelerating observers.
einstein_theories.general_relativity: Gravity is a consequence of the curvature of spacetime.
